Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio hit a pair of solo homers, including a game-tying blast in the bottom of the eighth inning
Garrett Mitchell hit a two-run shot to give the Brewers the lead
Devin Williams closed out the game in the top of the ninth
Post-Match Reflections: Mets fans were disappointed with the missed opportunity
Some fans criticized the bullpen's performance
There were questions about the Mets' ability to perform under pressure after playing a doubleheader
